author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Anyone strictly opposed to making blob txs transaction type 0x03? (0x03 was initially reserved for 3074 afaik, so no loss there). Would be good to not have gaps

author: roberto.bayardo
content: I recall 0x03 was being used for something else in Erigon; Starkware I think?  But I believe erigon has been removing it's non-Eth chain support so maybe not an issue.

author: roberto.bayardo
content: Just took a look and appears that code has been removed.
